events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their sedan and a delivery truck at the intersection of Main Street and 7th Avenue.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and verifying the involved vehicle types.
An claims agent specialized in auto accidents was assigned to handle this case, ensuring experienced support for the customer.
The insured was formally notified that their claim has been received and is now under review by the insurance company.
The customer was asked to provide the police accident report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of their driver's license.
All requested documents including accident report and vehicle photos were received from the customer promptly, aiding the process.
Investigation commenced to verify fault, assess vehicle damage, and review witness statements submitted by both parties.
Investigation concluded confirming partial liability of the insured and detailed assessment of repair costs has been finished.
A settlement offer was proposed including coverage for repair costs and medical expenses related to the auto accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the helpfulness of the claims agent throughout the process.
The claim was approved by the insurance company based on the investigation findings and agreement with the settlement terms.
Payment for the settlement amount was issued to the insuredâ€™s account to cover the vehicle repairs and medical treatments.
The claim was officially closed after confirming the payment was received and repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All case files related to the auto accident claim were archived in compliance with company policy for record retention.
